## OpenTelemetry class

Class used to send trace &amp; metrics to an open telemetry backend (only Jaeger for now) Need to be instanciate before anything else

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class OpenTelemetry 
```

## Example


```
new OpenTelemetry({
 type: 'api',
  name: 'api-user',
}).record();
```

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(props)](./subito-lib.opentelemetry._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>OpenTelemetry</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [record()](./subito-lib.opentelemetry.record.md) |  | Method used to start to export telemetry |
